TopicTitle: Well, I just terminated my Minecraft server.

Articles.Content:
I used to have a Minecraft server, one that I put a lot of work into. Everybody involved in it (devs, buiilders, etc., myself included) just kinda lost interest over time. I finally bit the bullet today and cancelled the server. Feels kind of funny...

On the bright side, I can now concentrate 100% on KSP. Which, I think we can all agree, is a lot cooler than Minecraft. Because spaceÃ¢â‚¬â€¹.
In contrast, I have just created a personal DarkMulitPlayer server for testing purposes.
I run a MC server on a Raspberry Pi in my basement.
Congratz on defeating an addiction to make time for another!
If you need anybody to help *cough* test, give me a call... XD
